reviews.review: 5점 만점에 1.7점 정도 줄 수 있을 것 같아요 ^^

Great chasing type game, a good change from run and shoot. Seems simple, but gets harder and keeps you interested due to upgrades and perks. I have played on Ipad and this is much better. Feels very satisfying when you win. Never get bored of hearing victims scream, watching them crawl on the ground, wimpering.  To win you need good timing, strategy, patience and navigation skills. There are a lot of monsters with very different traits, I love making people go mad with the Doctor, love throwing up on people,  love the speargun, the Clown tonics. The overall atmosphere is scary and creepy, finishing moves are the cherry on top. Well worth the money and time, thanks for a great game.
But only if you like a ton of toxic killers and survivors
好玩  只要不要被鬼砍到

Very fun game to play solo and with friends. Bought it on sale and is def worth the sale price as well as full price. If you plan on pouring a lot of time into this game, DLC is worth the money but some DLC can be bought with in game currency that one can get over time. 10/10 would buy again.

Kesinlikle oyun muazzam, eğer katil olarak oynamayı severseniz veya katilden kaçmalı oyun arıyorsanız bu oyun tam size göre. Harika bir oyun. Evet paralı ama bu zevki tatmak için cidden parayı hak eden bir oyun. Ben bu oyunu çok beğendim ve tavsiye ediyorum. Ünlü filmlerin ünlü karakterleri ve oyuncuları olan harika bir oyun.

If this game were an embodiment of a real human being, it's instant murder and homicide to them. The unimaginable actions I would inflict onto one person. Like, this game is like a drug addiction, once you take it, you can't stop doing it. That is why I have 517.2 hours since I bought the game. I am here to advise you stop you right here and direct you to a clearly better game, "Coloring Book For Kids". That's right, even a stupid coloring book for kids could probably surpass the life of this stupid repetitive game. And if you recently bought this game, I'd like to introduce you to the refund section. This section is probably one of the best sections in all of Steam! Best of all, you get your money back! And that's great especially when this game is a dumpster fire. Recently, they rolled out a Pride Charm for celebrating LGBTQ+ in June. From what I've heard, people get tunneled for either having the charm, or not. Basically, this community is also filled with homophobia and heterophobia (if thats a thing) constantly everyday. TLDR; This game is a soul pact, giving in your life to a toxic landfill. 

/srs I love this game, even if it may breakaway my mental health, the licensed DLC's are pretty cool like the Resident Evil Chapter. This game also appeals to many ideas of pop culture. Like K-POP and many other cultures around the world.
the game has got good detail its fun and never gets boring

I regret pre-ordering this game, I got it for the horror experience but that died down and DBD eventually turned into a toxic cash grab casino that gets you addicted.

Killer experience
1. You get all 4 survivors, they'll blame your perks or say you was slugging or tunneling like your not supposed to do that.
Or just tell you to kill yourself.
2. You get all 3 survivors, they'll tell you to stay at whatever rank your on and don't talk to them because they are rank 1.
3. You get no survivors, they'll tell you to git gud, and stay whatever rank your at and say your trash.
It's a lose lose situation, you'll spend the whole round going around a damn log or something that gives you deja vu, because loops aren't fun, its just boring.

Survivor experience
1. You get called a noob and get body blocked or get ranked up with a rank 1 killer
2. you'll probably spend 100 dollars on a bunch of skins n useless cosmetics
3. You'll develop a habit of just running loops and eventually getting bored.
I really want my money back, I shoulda stopped pumping my HOURS into the game.

Great game. Devs done pretty good job.
Usually has balance issues that change depending on the patch. Always updating. Has good people, has toxic people. Its the internet get used to it. Specifically if you're a new survivor, expect to die. A lot. There is a learning curve.
I've enjoyed it, so far
